other_tests.findings: Moderate to severe patent steatosis with a fat fraction of 22%. The pancreas is atrophic with low T1 signal progressive enhancement. Mild irregularity of a non-dilated pancreatic duct with multiple ectatic side branches. Low signal intensity stranding noted adjacent to the pancreatic tail as seen on prior CT, but this has significantly improved compared to previous imaging.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The low signal intensity stranding adjacent to the pancreatic tail has significantly improved compared to previous imaging.
